channel.title: Throne of Lies Quiz- Test your knowledge!
channel.description:
Recently, SuperWeegee from Discord made a quiz based on Throne of Lies gameplay and classes, it's worth checking out. You can find the quiz on the Throne of Lies Amino ( http://aminoapps.com/c/throne-of-lies ) at the specific URL you can even play the quiz without having the app (though you won't show up on the quiz leader boards if you're not a part of the Amino group, you can still test your knowledge!) at the link of http://aminoapps.com/p/240gf1 .
If you decide not to sign up on the Amino, but still wish to share your quiz results, post a Screenshot below to share how you did! :slight_smile:
Anyways, Chow.

314 points between the 2 quizzes.

159 gameplay. 155 general.
